summary: Run a test dataset through your workflow to check performance.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: The credentials to authenticate with Google Sheets.

parameters.name: authentication
parameters.description: Choose the authentication method: Service Account or OAuth2 (recommended).

parameters.name: documentid
parameters.description: Select the document containing the dataset from Google Sheets.

parameters.name: sheetname
parameters.description: Select the sheet containing the dataset from the chosen document.

parameters.name: limitrows
parameters.description: Whether to limit the number of rows to process.

parameters.name: maxrows
parameters.description: Maximum number of rows to process.

parameters.name: filtersui
parameters.description: Add filters to specify conditions for processing rows.
